name: Jump With It
description:
Jump With It is a small pixel art 2D game, where the goal is to reach the end of every level.

You will need to navigate each level by jumpting to different platforms, however there is a catch: You have a limited amount of jumps, the exact number of jumps you need.

Can you reach the end at the fastest time possible?

Controls

A/D for left/right

W/Space to jump

R to restart level
